-- | Simple Helper Library for using Amazon's Simple Storage Service (S3) with Yesod
--   
--   Simple Helper Library for using Amazon's Simple Storage Service (S3)
--   with Yesod
@package yesod-s3
@version 0.1.1

module Yesod.S3
uploadImage :: AWSConnection -> FileInfo -> String -> String -> [((Int, Int), Int, String)] -> ErrorT UploadError IO [(String, String)]
uploadFile :: AWSConnection -> FileInfo -> String -> String -> ErrorT UploadError IO ()
getLink :: AWSConnection -> String -> String -> Integer -> IO URI
instance Error UploadError
